pr_title: Fix Compilation error when function has a function typed param with only rest params

timeline.bodyText: We normally don't mention the issue number on fixes. Shall we remove the issue number?
timeline.author: irshadnilam

timeline.message: Resolve param issue when function typed params with rest params are used

timeline.bodyText: Do we need this comment? Shall we maybe improve it to indicate popping out the empty list added to the var list stack if no non-rest params are available?
